website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight bodyboard that can stand up to the waves and comes at a nice price point.
pros: Includes a tether and a leash that coils to a small length for carrying, but gives you plenty of length if you lose your footing
Does not get torn up in the waves
cons: While this product is strong, when the board fails, it is usually the plastic that starts to peel back

customer_reviews.title: They came extremely well packaged in excellent shape, and on time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boards, one slightly larger (I am 6'2" 210 pounds). They came extremely well packaged in excellent shape, and on time. Both boards look really spiffy! Finally got to try them out this weekend! They were both awesome! We have some pretty good surf relative to Florida here at Flagler Beach. Lately with Northeast winds, they waves have been even higher! The boards were SO much fun, and performed wonderfully. Rode the waves till I was exhausted! Highly recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Fred W Westenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year-old daughter. I need surfing partner and she is terrified of my surfboards so this is about getting her in the water with me. We haven't gone surfing yet but the board is excellent, comes with the leash and is already plugged. I jumped on it a few times in the pool and it surprisingly floated me (I'm 200lbs). Bottom is nice and hard and has channels out the back. I'm considering buying a a bigger one for me for blackball here in Oceanside.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy board! Great looking graphic!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy board. Colors are true to the picture & it arrived without defects. I especially like that it came with a sheet of instructions for assembly (leash) and care. Some reviews (various brands) mentioned bubbling after a few uses, but it may help to know that you should lay the board slick side up (not the graphic side) when not in use at the beach. I didn’t know that. This product came with that advice. I’ll put it to the test during an upcoming beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B

customer_reviews.title: Great board!  Great company!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's 17th birthday. He's been using cheap boogie boards for a while which are not nearly as much fun. He has already used this board several times and loves it. I am very impressed with the customer service for this company. I received a follow-up e-mail on the purchase just to check in on how we liked it and I know that if anything does go wrong they will fix it. Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Krisasand

customer_reviews.title: Best under $100
customer_reviews.text: The boards are hard to beat for the money. Customer service is very responsive should you need them. This is the second board from surf and snow and both are sturdy and comfortable. 41 mm works great for us as we are all 5'7"-5'11" and 125-160 lbs. There have been no problems with function or durability.
customer_reviews.author: AICD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This board is lightweight, the base is sturdy, and the color is vibrant; however, after about a week of light use by a 9 year old in a swimming pool, the outer lining started to bubble. I brought it in our shed after each use. A week later when used, the lining started peeling up from the side, and another week later the outer lining had completely come up. My kids barely used it; my son basically laid on it and paddled himself across the pool. My daughter (50 pounds) would stand on it and see how long she could balance-that’s about all they did with it since we couldn't take a beach trip due to Covid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Minter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged in multiple places
customer_reviews.text: Not off to a good start. Arrived dented/smashed/damaged in multiple spots, and has a bunch tiny puncture holes in a section of the top of the board as well. I was hoping that by spending $50 I would get a little better quality board, but probably should have opted for a $30 board with similar reviews instead. Hopefully the shop that sold it will try to make this right somehow, but I don’t have time to return it right now as I take off for my wedding trip states away in a couple days where I planned to use this board. I guess we’ll just use it and see how it rides the waves...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This board arrived in perfect condition and the color is exactly as described. I can’t wait for my son to get to use this board in a few weeks when we head to the beach! I was a little nervous with some of the other reviews/pictures of boards arriving damaged, but I ordered two and they are both totally fine. They shipped in a large box with padding so no issues with any dents or anything. Since we aren’t using the boards yet I’ll update this review after our vacation but judging by look and feel they are going to be great for my 10 and 7 year old sons!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These fall apart within a year.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these five stars after the first week of use, but I need to update to a 1 Star and let you know that before a year was up the side panels had come unglued on two of the three BPS boards I bought. And the layer near the nose has separated as well. Disappointed! By the time I thought to see if these had a warranty, I missed the year date by one week.
customer_reviews.author: H. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very durable board
customer_reviews.text: Bought this board for my son and his friend to play on at the beach. They abused this thing like you wouldn't believe and it survived with zero damage. We will be able to use this board again next summer, which has never happened before. We usually don't even get one summer of use out of a board before it's in the garbage. We are extremely pleased with our purchase and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works very well
customer_reviews.text: Got this in July 2017 for my husband's birthday. We've used it about 6x a year since then and it's still holding up like new with little wear and tear in 2020. It's pretty firm so it doesn't bend in half and has a sleek bottom so it glides on the water nicely (as opposed to another one we have that's covered in some type of fabric and the water gathers inside the fabric causing the board to just drag and sink). I'm not a boogie board expert, but we've been super happy with it and have had a blast catching the waves on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boogie boards!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for 11, 8, 4 year old. They arrived quickly and in great shape. Spent 3 days at the beach and kids loved them. The tethers are meant for keeping board from drifting away. My 4 year old needed a little help so I was using the teather to pull her and it came off (user error). I am happy with how they worked. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.  Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My grandson used it only a few times before air bubbles appeared under the cover. The covering came apart on the edges as well. I paid a fair price for this item and was extremely disappointed my grandson is only 6 and was not at all tough w it. What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend as it is sturdy, stable, has good surface area to allow kids to ride (Different Size boards, read their description, ours fit perfectly to their description). This thing took a beating from my three boys in the outer banks! Strap always felt securely connected to the board, never felt flimsy, cheap and the design is nice and clean, simple. Scrapes up against coarse sand and rocks and nothing impacted its performace
customer_reviews.author: AC CHIL

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bodyboard is very light and has a good shape. It arrived with pallet strap indents in the side and a ding in the plastic bottom. The bottom doesn't look like it will last long due to it being so thin. For $50, it's a little better than you'd get at a novelty beach store. Don't expect much, but for the price it's not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Skishark11

customer_reviews.title: Storm bodyboard
customer_reviews.text: This board is awesome. Just returned from a week at the beach and not one bubble on this board!!!! Most of the time, when not being used, the board was white side up to keep it from getting so hot. But, even though this didn't happen every time the kids used the board, there were still no bubbles. I highly recommend this board! Shirley P.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great  board and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bodyboard for a grandson over a year ago (he is still using it). We purchased a second one just a few weeks ago for the little brother. The board started to split after a week of use. We contacted the seller and immediately, we received a refund and purchased the same board again. Both grandsons love their boards and use them frequently!! Great product and wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board
customer_reviews.text: In looking for a body board there is so much variation in the recommendation for the size of board based on weight/height. The recommended size board for me was 38-39". I am 57 years old with a muscular build, 5'2", 120 lbs. This board came in 37" so I wasn't sure if it would work for me. I am a beginner to this sport and found the 37" worked perfectly for me. Every wave that I went for, I was able to catch. (I also bought the wild horn fins which may have also helped in catching those waves). The board is sturdy and light weight with a nice leash.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Howes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking board, but unfortunately it didn’t hold up. We bought this for my son for Christmas. We didn’t use it until summer. The first use, the hard plastic on the bottom cracked a little. Since we were outside the return period, we glued it and tried again. The second use, the colored wrap on the top came off completely. We can’t recommend this one- hopefully a different brand will hold up for more than an hour or two in the water, especially since my son is not hard on these. The cheapies from the tourist traps have held up far better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: No happy at all but Customer service is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter last year at end of summer, we stared to use it this year & it fell apart !!! At the seam. Now the whole top is lifted off , she is 6 very upset. No way to get a reimbursement or replacement cause to long has passed. Sad mom wasted money - 1week later - Update the company reached out to me & gave full money back or replacement. I took the refund cause the board will not make it here till end of summer they said. Unfortunately things happen to products but at least you are a company with great customer service, thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kevish

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my 11 year old daughter. She loves it so excited to attach the straps and use it. Very sturdy and better quality than I expected. My husband has a pro board and he really likes this we’re buying another one for our son
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Delaminated
customer_reviews.text: This board completely delaminated from the bottom to the top. Nice color. I bought the brightest ones so I wouldn’t lose my kids in the surf, but we only used a couple of times and the pink foam delaminated from the top. And the white slick bottom also delaminated from the bottom. Not worth $50!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubbled up and popped first day used
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles up and popped the first day used. It was used for 3 hours. On and off. For this price I expect way better quality. Go to a surf shop and pay that much you’ll get a better body board.
customer_reviews.author: Talis

customer_reviews.title: Dents after 1 time use
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3d body board and the most expensive one. I got it for my 7 year old son. After one day use the are one dent on top of the board and smashed corner on the bottom. I guess the density of the EPS core is poor. I have pink board from Costco ( $30) it lasted 6 month of every day use with no dents. As well I have Odysea classic ($80) 2 month every day use looks like new. I am sorry I have spent $110 on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gladkov

customer_reviews.title: They just don’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 of these. They all have fallen apart. The sides, the tops, the bottoms. Better off just getting bigger quality the first time. I have to replace all 3. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality body boards
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boards and they were delivered quickly just in time for our beach vacation. The size was great, very vibrant colors and the cord was better than what usually comes with boards.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, peels within weeks - vendor's customer service was outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Started peeling within a couple of weeks of purchase. It's not great quality. Customer service was above reproach. Handled the situation admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Popescu

customer_reviews.title: Bubble formed under foam topper within 34 days with limited use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this just over a month ago and it has a giant bubble under the foam. We haven’t used it more than a few times. Unfortunately, we are unable to return it because the 30 day return policy just expired. It’s disappointing that, for the price, this happened after such a short period of time. It’s mostly been stored in our garage for the last 34 days.
customer_reviews.author: NKC

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 14 year old nephew. It’s light weight but looks sturdy. I guess we’ll know when he hits the ocean w it this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these boards for our annual trip to Laguna Beach and we had some nice waves so the boards were hit hard. We are very happy with the quality. The boards are sturdy and kids feel more secure. We are lucky to live in Southern California so we be going to many beaches over the summer. We hope to get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these for our boys and am very dissatisfied. Save your money and just buy a $20.00 board. These boards bubbled up on the first day from the sun. The corners are pealing up on 2 of them already also. Again Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Quality is awesome and value for cost can’t ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as gift for two boys. These are great. Quality is awesome and value for cost can’t be beat. I would buy more of these if I needed them for sure no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: lightweight to carry but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old to boogie board in the Pacific on the Oregon coast. It is light weight for her, so easy to carry and very sturdy. I used it also and was very pleased with the quality and the price was much less then other boards, would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen L. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: My brother took the bodyboard to OC MD & the whole front of the board came apart. Very poorly made. I guess they thought we would just be using it in the pool. I am very upset for this was a birthday present. I guess I should of just bought a cheap board from sunsations:(
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They dented pretty easily but it doesn’t effect the usefulness of the boards. I would spend the money and buy a little bit nicer of a board next time but that’s just because I want it to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually as advertised. I ordered this body board after researching many products. It is a quality board and very light weight, which was my hope. In addition, the seller provided excellent product service after I contacted them to discuss a minor matter about shipment. I would puchase again.
customer_reviews.author: gjzmo

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Too Light
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, well constructed, and extremely light. Great board if you want to do tricks with your board (full rotation on wave). However, this board wont hold you if you aim for speed while (like body surfing).
customer_reviews.author: SurferWoman

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: the product is high in price,i had another that was better and cheaper,im not impressed at all..
customer_reviews.author: mustang

customer_reviews.title: Defective Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 bodyboards and this is the only one with a defect. This board developed a large bubble under the skin after one trip to beach. Unfortunately since this was a Christmas gift, the beach trip was beyond the return window. An email was sent to the vendor but no response was received. Do not recommend due to negative reaction by vendor.
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Outside skin started separating from inside foam after only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship - disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited and did a lot of research to find this board for my 9 year old daughter that was using an old good board from my childhood. Got this for her for Christmas as her “very own board” and on the second day out the board broke and side piece fell off. Might be able to glue it, but frustrated that this happened after hearing great reviews about this board. Will be reaching out to the manufacturer to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Houser

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u dont go to dangerous wave with the strap after used more days multiple days.
customer_reviews.text: Update: its getting deformed and there arent stringers so obviosly my board is starting to bend, the strap is almost wearing off. If your very active and always go body boarding then this board shouldnt be the one. Used it right after i received. I notice that i can ride waves quite easier for some reason. But the only problem is manuevering felt a bit hard. Also after riding small waves for 2 hours the strap is slowly detoriating quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, board began to fall apart after 1 use. Base has peeled and top cracked. Wont even make it through 1 summer. Wish there was a zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Enoch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board!!!
customer_reviews.text: Four stars only because we haven’t taken out to the beach yet. Arrived on time, in great condition!! Looks like great quality, and comes with a leash. Ooh even fin tethers and instructions if needed. We’re very excited, birthday present for 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality of this board is very disappointing, but maybe its defective
customer_reviews.text: WE ordered one blue and one pink board. The boards just being used minimally and with care, both boards fell apart after the second and third time of use. The sides peeled and the bottom of the board peeled. Please advise how you can assist us and stand by your product. I have the boards and please let me know if you would like me to submit photos.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine French

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish it has handles on sides. My daughter's hands kept sliding off. But she had fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marandina

customer_reviews.title: Delamination
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item in January this year and used it a few times. It has delaminated which seems unusual. Can it be replaced? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality board. The neoprene wrist/ankle strap is very comfortable. 2 Flipper straps of same quality included.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gimness

customer_reviews.title: Bent, appears defect
customer_reviews.text: This boogie board was bent on the bottom left back upon receipt. It also looks like it is defective at the top right. Disappointed for almost $100 spent. The dealer said on his paperwork which came with it that he can be contacted, but there is no email and appears no info available to do so on Amazon either. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: My son took it out and was so excited to buy his first "high quality" board. But it broke only after a few tries. No bueno.
customer_reviews.author: A. Christian

customer_reviews.title: very nice board
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I went to destin fla and rode waves all summer long. trust me the color green was nice and bright. the wrist band is heavy duty and you will have loads of fun with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used them a ton in pretty rough surf in Cancun and the boys loved them
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 boards as carry ons on our flight to Mexico and had no issues. Used them a ton in pretty rough surf in Cancun and the boys loved them. Super high quality that don't break down, don't blister, and really hold up to a pounding. I would highly recommend at the $40 price point. Customer service is terrific as well. They really seem to stand by and have pride in their product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son. Best $50 I’ve ever spent. I tried it out and loved it. Very light weight, cord leash is amazingly comfortable. Arrived in perfect condition and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The bodyboard is nice quality, lightweight and perfect for my niece. Love the pink color. I was impressed with the seller ... super speedy delivery and the item was packaged very well. They followed up with an email to ensure I was happy with my purchase. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: This fell apart after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money i paid this should be a better made boogie board. It fell apart after 2 uses. would like to return for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vandaley

customer_reviews.title: great job
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It arrived in perfect condition and in the time requested. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bodyboard
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. We were very pleasantly surprised at the build quality of these boards. We hit the waves and they were easy to control and a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Friedenthal

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Board is good for my 10 year old grandson. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen oesterreicher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great boogie board! Used by my 7, 9 and 11 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Epps

customer_reviews.title: Good build
customer_reviews.text: These are great boards. My husband and daughter took them to the beach with us, and had a great time using them. Great quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: After only 30 minutes in the ocean with only 1-2 foot waves the board has already creased and dented, I doubt it will even last another couple times in the ocean. And we're talking very small waves and no wipeouts.
customer_reviews.author: JVP

customer_reviews.title: Lower side bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Bought it at July 2020. Lower side of the board started to bubble and peel off after a couple months of non intense ride. Used and stored along with another brand board and that board is still fine
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Small size is perfect for 5 yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller boogie board for my grandson and this one is just perfect. We can’t get him out of the water now that he’s got his own board!
customer_reviews.author: dadof5andtucker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last through the summer! Bought 2 of these for Xmas presents. Had to throw them both away. One 3 weeks ago and the other this week, as the top material bubbled, delaminated and peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Run Ko

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for a week at the beach and the bottom corner plastic peeled back on day 2:(.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product, transported and stored with great care. Used about 20 times and exterior completely ripped off board. Unable to get a response from manufacturer after sending email with pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Hagarty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boys are going to have fun with these. Seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: vpcs

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Great board. Delivered on time, packaged as promised. Nice addition to have the fin teathers. Board rides well and initially appears to be great quality. Only used it once though and look forward to many many more rides. Nice follow-up customer service as well by the owner.
customer_reviews.author: Clint J Parry

customer_reviews.title: ****Another great product with customer service from Surf & Snow Warehouse!!!
customer_reviews.text: Another great product with customer service from Surf & Snow Warehouse. A great small family company with caring customer service and only the best quality products! Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great board Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the board. This board came packaged well and was great for the price. Make sure when yoy purchase you pay attention to the sizes to get the right one for your height and weight. We are very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Our site family enjoyed using the board. We picked up 2 other boards that weren't even comparable. I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Boards held up in tough surf in the Outer Banks of North Carolina
customer_reviews.text: My stepsons are 12 and 14. The in the Outer Banks were pushing to 4 feet. The Storm boards and their coiled leashes held up perfectly. Hope to use these boards for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 times at the beach with the kids and probably only 15 minutes actual use the board is already delaminating. This is one of the most expensive boards on the market. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Palise

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The outer foam covering split after a few weeks use. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months, Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this item was broken after two month of very light usage. We only use it 3-4 times at the beaches and the plastic surface is falling off. Totally waste of time and money. Need REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: Y Ran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves it so much I just bought a second one for my 4 year old. Very sturdy and holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Covering ripped off
customer_reviews.text: We used this for less then 2 beach weeks and the covering on the sides came off and now the top is completely loose. Very disappointed for the cost. Would not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: J Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother, who really wanted one. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my kayak outrigger with my outboard motor to really cruise
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Good board doesn't last...Bought this for my daughter to use over the summer and in less than 2 months foam is completely separating...
customer_reviews.author: Charles D Close IV

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it one summer. I have purchased cheeper $5. Foam boards that have lasted longer. We purchased two of these the other has dents in the bottom. Just not great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth it
customer_reviews.text: These boards are very average. Ours came apart in less than a month after using maybe 6 times. You can do better for less at any beach store anywhere there is a beach.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn i.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bodyboard for my son to play with at the beach. He was thrilled and had a wonderful time. The board was delivered on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: JBtrees

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that I got my son this expensive boogie board and it didn’t last 2 months. I would like a replacement board or my money back. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Well Built!
customer_reviews.text: The products seemed well made and rugged out of the box. They will be used by two, seven-year-old identical twins, so should go through their paces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value body board
customer_reviews.text: We bought a few brand options, and this was the best especially for the price. Well constructed, superior leash to the others and my kids caught waves.
customer_reviews.author: Nameth Strick

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it for the first time this weekend and it broke. It has several crack lines on the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The purple paint bled off on us first thing, but other than that, these worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Spends Too Much

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandson and he was very happy. Good quality of the board
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he was very happy. Good quality of the board. Will give update when he it!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Great item! came as advertised. Kids think it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. My husband used it and loved it
customer_reviews.text: Held up well, all week at the beach and it survived to be used again next year. Highly recommend. My husband used it and loved it, he's 6'3" and 195lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery! And a perfect board for our vacation to the coast.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing board for the price. Our son spends hours out in the water on his board. I would definitely buy this brand again.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board  & right price!
customer_reviews.text: Body board arrived one day early, excellent packaging, and great for teens & adults at the beach!!!

customer_reviews.text: Bought this boogie board for my son to use in the ocean. Perfect size for him. Seems to be well made.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the hard bottom on it the last one we ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hard bottom on it the last one we bought didn't have it and lasted very little Its my daughter that rides it.

customer_reviews.title: Peeling cover
customer_reviews.text: I used the board for two days at the Jersey shore and the side covering started peeling.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: it Was great for the ocean. A great gift for my 10 year old grandson.

customer_reviews.title: He was delighted with the product and looks forward to using it ...
customer_reviews.text: The Bodyboard arrived on time in America for our grandson's 10th birthday. He was delighted with the product and looks forward to using it on Lake Michigan when the weather improves. Great service, thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was as expected. Can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BPS Storm Bodyboard - Includes Premium Coiled Leash and Swim Fin Tethers/Savers
feature_bullets: BPS STORM Bodyboard Pack comes with a Super lightweight Body Board and fantastic PREMIUM coiled bodyboard leash (MRRP $16.99 on its own), plus a set of fin tethers to make sure you don't lose your swim fins. The premium and super comfy coiled leash will keep your board attached to you at all times. PLEASE NOTE: Pack includes one bodyboard, one leash and two fin savers. Leash and Fin tethers will be at the very bottom of the board wrapped in a tight bundle underneath the plastic wrapping

HDPE Slick bottom to intensify the performance driven by the board. It does not only add strength, but it also makes the bodyboard a resistance-free riding for improved speed and maneuverability. Its EPS core, bottom rear channels is for great execution and a crescent tail to enhance it more. Please check the size that will suit you by using the recommendation chart on the pictures

When you purchase you will be receiving printed instructions included w / the board written by us (with photos of course!) on how to install your leash and use your fin tethers. We'll also tell you how to look after your STORM Body Board by leaving the board 'white side up' when in the sun. (This is the same for ALL 'soft' surfboards, Body-boards and SUP's as this stops air pressure building up within the board).

Buy with TOTAL confidence – each Bodyboard pack has a SERIOUS guarantee - if you are not 100% satisfied on delivery your board will be replaced or refunded (you choose) - and then the board is guaranteed against any defects for a FULL 12 MONTHS – And like ALL products from 'Surf and Snow Warehouse ' these Boards are stored and shipped (quickly and reliably) to you by Amazon in the US.

Thank you for looking at a product from our store - Surf and Snow. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love - water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100% (please do check our feedback) - So if you have any questions about using any of our products please just ask. Thank you.
